name: V-Tennis 2
overview: The sequel to V-Tennis features new characters and different camera angles and this game modes: - Edit: You can create your own player and has a number of points to assign to the differents strokes and created a player with the style of play that you want and you can save and use it in world circuit mode - World Circuit , you can choose between 20 differnt chartacters ; 11 male and 9 female and then start playing tournaments - Build up: You choose bettween a male or female tennis player , with a number of points at the start to improve the diferent strokes and then start playing agains other players to gain more points - Normal: You can play a match in singles or doubles modes with up to four players, you can also choose the court from eight differnt places, the surface and the number of sets.
